True or False: The nickname of Morgan Freeman\'s character in "Million Dollar Baby" is Red.
True or False: Elizabeth Taylor married the same man twice.
True or False: "The Sandlot" was released in 1993.
True or False: "Moonlight" won Best Picture in 2018.
True or False: Molly Ringwald made four movies with director John Hughes.
True or False: Julia Roberts was married to Kiefer Sutherland.
True or False: Val Kilmer was offered the role of Johnny in the movie "Dirty Dancing."
True or False: Meg Ryan played Tom Cruise\'s love interest in the movie "Top Gun."
True or False: It took 7 hours to do Zoe Saldana\'s Gamora make up for "Guardians of the Galaxy."
True or False: "Jaws" was originally released in the summer of 1975.
True or False: Mindy Kaling played Mrs. Whatsit in the movie "A Wrinkle In Time."
True or False: "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs" was the first feature-length animated film ever released.
True or False: Steven Spielberg won his first Oscar for Best Director for "Schindler\'s List."
True or False: Ian McKellen is the only actor to receive an Oscar nomination for acting in a "Lord of the Rings" movie.
